price: Walang hinihintay ang mga ito kundi nag-iisang hiyaw na wala itong anumang pagpapaliban.
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
